Target: OntoApplication is an ontology for representing software applications and their services.

Comment: A computer program designed to help people perform an activity.
Label: Application

Comment: A software application designed to run on a mobile device.
Label: Mobile application

Comment: An e-folder for receiving and storing messages.
Label: Inbox

Comment: A communication containing some information, news, advice, request, or the like.
Label: Message

Comment: The category in which a message information falls under.
Label: Message category

Comment: A type of message pertaining to asset information.
Label: Asset information

Comment: A type of message pertaining to maintenance information.
Label: Maintenance information

Comment: A relationship that describes the mobile application installed on a smart phone.
Label: has installed

Comment: A relationship that describes the inbox provided by an application.
Label: has inbox

Comment: A relationship that describes the messages contained in an inbox.
Label: contains

Comment: A relationship that describes the category in which a message falls under.
Label: has message category

Comment: An identifier assigned to a message.
Label: has message ID

Comment: A descriptive or general heading of a message.
Label: has title

Comment: The information contained in a message.
Label: has content

Comment: The firebase Id assigned to an application.
Label: has firebase ID

Comment: An identifier assigned to an application.
Label: has application ID
